transcript: man if I just did twice as much as I'm doing I still wouldn't make any progress you're right you wouldn't because you need to do like 30 times or 100 times more work that's for people's beliefs about minimum standards get reset my billionaire buddy he was talking about building his personal brand he was like can you help me with my social media and I said sure like how many times a week are you posting he's like well I post every day and I was like we put out 350 pieces a week and he just looked at me and he was like thank you for resetting my minimum standard like it was just orders of magnitude he was posting 7 a week I was posting 50 times more than him so yeah of course we're growing more
